file.title: Select a file
file.description: Drag & drop or click to select a file.

contact.error: An error occurred while submitting contact form

photo.unauthorized: You are not authorized to process photos
photo.error: An error occurred while processing photos

mail.success: An email has been sent to reset your password
mail.error: An error occurred while sending email. Retry later.

get.error: An error occurred while fetching your profile

update.error: An error occurred while updating your profile

password.length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.special-character: Password must contain at least one special character

modal.title: Logout
modal.text: Are you sure you want to logout ?

contact.title: Contact

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Hello, I'd like to help Tassadraft : how can I do so ?

contact.consent: I agree to the processing of my personal data for the purpose of responding to my inquiry in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

intellectual-property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual-property.description: The Tassadraft application and its content (texts, images, logos) are protected by copyright. Any reproduction or representation, in whole or in part, without written authorization is prohibited.
intellectual-property.disclaimer: Magic: The Gathering is a registered trademark of Wizards of the Coast. Tassadraft is neither affiliated with nor endorsed by Wizards of the Coast.

personal-data.title: Personal Data
personal-data.description: The information collected via the application is intended for managing subscriptions and improving services.
personal-data.rights: In accordance with the 'Informatique et Libertés' law and the GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, and delete your data.
personal-data.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at:

terms-of-use.title: Terms of Use (ToU)
terms-of-use.description: Using the application implies acceptance of the ToU available on our website.
details: Card recognition and deck management services are accessible through a paid subscription.
Pricing and terms are detailed in the ToU.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: Tassadraft strives to ensure the accuracy of the information provided. However, it cannot be held responsible for any errors or omissions, nor for the consequences of using this information.

hyperlinks.title: Hyperlinks
hyperlinks.description: The application may contain links to third-party websites. Tassadraft has no control over these sites and disclaims any responsibility for their content.

applicable-law.title: Applicable Law
applicable-law.description: This legal notice is governed by French law. In the event of a dispute, and after any attempt at amicable resolution has failed, the French courts shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

modal.title: Photos processing
modal.text: Some photos seem not to be processed yet.
modal.question: Do you want to process them ?

tassadecks.delete-deck: Are you sure you want to delete

card.title: New deck
card.description: Create a new deck from zero or by importing a file

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: This is a aggro deck that's supposed to win in 5 turns.

file.title: Import deck list file
file.description:
Archidekt is supported
Line format :
<[quantity]x [english card name] [...]>

card.title: Edit a deck
card.description: Edit one of your decks, or one shared with you

card.title: Browse all decks
card.description: Browse all public, shared with you, and your decks

visuals.help: This category is used to pick deck illustrations in addition to commanders : if multiple cards are present, a random will be picked

related-cards.title: Related cards
related-cards.description: Those cards are not included into deck cards.

clear-categories.title: Clear categories
clear-categories.text: Are you sure you want to clear empty categories ? This is not reversible.

forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.subtitle: You have to be logged & subscribed to access this app's part.
